OOC: Sorry about the male female thing, and I wasn't ignoring your posts, I=
 must have not been getting them recently, I don't ignore mails.

Serge is =
hit in the side of the head by Najah and slowly looks at Najah. His eyes gl=
ow with the fire of the pit. He raised his blaster and toggles it to one of=
 it's 3 modes, he toggles it to flamethrower and fires a repeated burst of =
flames at Najah...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Airshadow Nightl=
ight 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, October 27, 2000 12:20 AM
 =
 Subject: RE: Najah going to join at his team.


  (For you information Naj=
ah is MALE-BOT,  and I thought that Horn-drill had left the battle and I wa=
s getting boring thatyou ignore my posts)

  :: Najah::

 and started to shot at Serge

    From: T=
HECODE

    Sent: Thursday, October 26, 2000 3:=
27 PM
    Subject: Re: Najah going to join at his team.


    OOC: Actually=
, Horn Drill never ran away, but I yearn to end the battle,
    I'll go alo=
ng with what you said. The only team member still around now is
    Serge, =
the others are slowly retreating.

    BIC: Serge looks down (Please don't =
attack me, but I don't know how big
    Najah is, but Serge did impress his=
 team when he ate someone before) at
    Najah. Serge did not like to talk,=
 it was not his way.

    Serge: Hello.

    Serge fired at Pyro twice and =
looked back to Najah to see what her reaction
    was...
    ----- Original=
 Message -----
    From: "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@...>

    > Najah::

ajah was upset  'cause the hornie-pony had run a way.

ad, well bad luck, others'd pay.

where his team. He
